Change the default website which loads on
start of Browser Here you can enter a custom user agent. Let empty to use default one Add custom search url also choose “Custom
search engine” as search provider Choose your preferred search engine or
set a custom one Clear your browser data or decide what data
will be cleared when you leave the app Decide which components of the browser
will be on start Change the behavior and ui of the app to
suit your preferences To show the filter dialog long press on the bookmark icon in the overview. Decide which filters you will use Use gestures on the toolbar and the "Navigation button" Import and export several app data(whitelist, bookmarks) Browser settings, there you can depending on
your android version grant permission. Delete the whole database (Start page, bookmarks,history and all whitelist) Every time you quit all above checked data will be deleted This will delete all your current settings and data. Will you proceed? Enable Network images, Disabling could be useful
to save mobile data and load website faster Allow websites to access your location. Some
websites {google, maps for nav) need this enable Save the history of visited websites Tell websites that you would prefer to save data. Supported websites will load faster JavaScript whitelist Enable JavaScript. Many websites need
JavaScript for their functionality. But they are
also rest and can be used for attacks Enable AdBlockto block annoying ads. Sites also load faster when enabled AdBlock whitelist Enable Cookies. Cookies are small text files, which are stored on your device. Websites use them for example to store user settings. But they could also be used to collect personal user data. Third party cookies are always disabled. Cookies whitelist Confirmation dialog when
closing browser Confirmation dialog when closing a tab Reopen a new tab when the last tab is closed instead of exiting the browser Set the app theme Charge the font size for displaying websites if checked, content will be rendered in a inverted gray scale mode. This is a kind of night mode Use the whole screen when scrolling through website if you press the back button you will leave fullscreen mode Pressing back will make the toolbar visible, before going back in history Decide where the Navigation button will be
placed What should be shown at the start of the Overview? The Start Page, your bookmarks,… Open the Overview on every app start All files will be exportednto the directory of your sd: card. This directory will be DELETE.D if you uninstall "Screen Mirroring". So make a backup regularly on a save place. Hello first fragment Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s Help Settings Languages More Apps Rate Us MainActivity Screen Mirroring Make sure your phone and TV are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. Wi-Fi Connected Wi-Fi Disconnected General Communicate Send Feedback Tutorial How to use? Streaming Streaming Quality Auto Stop Auto Minimize Advance Orientation Mode Stop video when connection
to target is lost Hide app when mirroring begins Casting orientation Mirroring mode Screen mirroring privacy policy Privacy Policy Supporting Devices See which devices support mirroring Color Theme Dark Light Auto Version: %s Select Language close Images Silder Screen Mirror Your target device has to be in the same Wi-Fi network as this device, because Screen Mirror is transmitting your screen. Stream your device’s screen over Wi-Fi to your computer, notebook or tablet. You can also use your device’s hotspot (tethering mode) and connect your target device to your hotspot. Open site on your target device. By scanning the QR code the connection configuration is transmitted and mirroring starts. Please be aware that Screen Mirror only works when setup correctly. Screen Mirror transmit your screen, but not your device’s audio signals. If you face any problems contact us. Enjoy smooth and high quality streaming
with no lagging Connect with any smart device and enjoy the
show on any screen Enjoy in-app private browser with no limitations Screen Setup Device's Hotspot Scan Code Support Finish Our Policies Protecting you privacy is important to us. We hope the following statement will help you understand how we deals with the personal identifiable information, you may occasionally provide to us via Internet (the Google Play platform).

Generally. we do not collect any PII from you when you download our Android applications. To be specific, we do not require the consumers visits of our application, we even don’t have a Server to store such PII.

Screen Mirroring uses Facebook as ads provider. Facebook wants to show ads that are relevant to you. For more information please visit
https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices.

The only situation we may get access to you PII is when you personally decide to email us your feedback or to provide us with a bug report. The PII we may get from you in that situation are strictly limited to you name, email address and your survey response only.

In above situation, we guarantee that you PII will only be used for contacting you and improving our services. We will never use such information (e.g your name and email address_ for any other purposes, such as to further market our products, or to disclose your personal information to a third party for commercial gains.

Its should be noted that whether or not to send us your feedback or bug report is a completely voluntary initiative upon your own decision. If you have concern about your PII being misused, or if you want further information about our privacy policy and what it means, please feel free to email us at screenmirroring.feedback@gmail.com, we will endeavor to provide clear answers to your questions in a timely manner. Please write your feedback Your System Info will be sent to Screen Mirroring tech Department Send provide feedback Invalid Email provided Check your internet connection type here… Enter your email (optional) Enjoy the App? Rate your experience using Screen
Mirroring App. Not now Feedback: Model: Brand: OS Version: Manufacturer: RAM: Send mail Select Picture Help Center
My Phone gets stuck at “Connecting” when pairing up with TV. It worked for me before, but it doesn’t work now. It shows that my device is not supported. My TV is an old TV and does not support wi-fi. The image on TV is black, but the sound can be heard. Connection will be interrupted after a while. Is my personal information or mobile data absolutely safe?
Restart the smart phone’s Wi-Fi and see if the connection is successful. Turn off the TV and remove its power cord from the socket as well. Wait 1 minute and restart the TV. Shorten the distance between your phone and the TV. Take it up close.
If it worked before, then it definitely can be used again. Most connection problems can be solved by restarting devices. Just restart both your phone and TV, follow the regular connection process to retry.
This means that your phone itself does not support the screen mirroring function. You can use XCast to cast video, audio and photo to TV. With XCast, you can do other things with your phone while casting to TV.
If your TV supports HDMI interface, we recommend that you buy an external receiver for screen mirroring. Such as Chromecast, Anycast etc.
Some content involves copyright protection and cannot be displayed on third party devices, such as Netflix, Disney Plus etc. You can download the video or look for the same resource on other apps to have a try.
You may turn on the Smart Connect in your Wi-Fi settings. It will search for better Wi-fi connections constantly, and always connect back and forth. Please make sure that the Wi-Fi of the mobile phone and TV is the SAM and the best signal.
We will not monitor or collect any information on you and your mobile phone. You can cast your screen without any worry. The system may warn you that there is a safety hazard before screen mirroring. This is just a regular reminder, it will be
WI-FI MIRACAST INSTALL Manual Make sure your phone and TV are connected
to the same Wi-Fi network.
